references.reason: This foundational textbook on algorithms is directly referenced as the source of the algorithmic reasoning tasks in the benchmark used for evaluation.
This paper introduces the CLRS benchmark, the primary dataset used for evaluating the proposed open-book neural algorithmic reasoning framework.

references.paper_title: Neural algorithmic reasoners are implicit planners
references.reason: This work is cited for its exploration of neural algorithmic reasoning and its relation to planning, providing important context for the current research.
This paper proposes multi-task training on the CLRS benchmark, which is directly compared to and built upon by the open-book approach in this paper.
This work is mentioned for its introduction to the field of neural algorithmic reasoning (NAR), providing foundational context and establishing the importance of the area.
